properties.name: eureka.client.healthcheck.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Eureka health check handler.

properties.name: ribbon.restclient.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the deprecated Ribbon RestClient.

properties.name: ribbon.http.client.enabled
properties.description: Deprecated property to enable Ribbon RestClient.

properties.name: ribbon.okhttp.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of the OK HTTP Client with Ribbon.
